In the Land Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine there is a professional training of military drivers.

About thisreportedCommander of the Land Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Lieutenant General Alexander Pavlyuk.

He also published a video showing exactly how the training of military drivers.

“Mastering weapons, masking equipment, driving in extreme conditions day and night. And most importantly - constant control of the situation, when you are responsible not only for yourself, but also for the combat brothers, ”the commander said.
